mathematical_programming

Class SwissLand

  • java.lang.Object
    • mathematical_programming.SwissLand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MP_Interface

    public class SwissLand
extends java.lang.Object
implements MP_Interface
    Use the weedcontrol model from agroscope as an optimizer on the activities. This class runs the model, reads the input, and modifies the required control files.
    Author:
    kellerke

      • runModel

        public void runModel(java.util.Properties cmd,
                     int nFarm,
                     int year,
                     boolean pricingAverage,
                     int memoryLengthAverage)
        Description copied from interface: MP_Interface
        Run the gams MP model based on the configuration we set in the inputsforMP model
        Specified by:
        runModel in interface MP_Interface
        Parameters:
        cmd - :: command object based on control.properties file
        nFarm - :: how many farms we run in the system
        year - :: what simulation year we are testing (can change the run if it's the first iteration)
        pricingAverage - :: used in weedcontrol to set average pricing of wheat over previous iterations
        memoryLengthAverage - :: used to set how long agents remember (use average across group despite possible inter-farm variations)

        Read results from MP model with income of each agent
        Specified by:

        allFarms - :: full list of farm agents in system

        :: return income list

        public void inputsforMP(Farm farm,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> possibleActivity)

        Generate the required input files for the gams MP model
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        possibleActivity - :: list of possible activities that this farm will send to the gams MP model

      • getExitActivity

        public java.util.ArrayList<Activity> getExitActivity()
        Description copied from interface: MP_Interface
        If agent leaves system then we set an exit activity. We want to keep the agent in the system, we just don't want further calculations for this agent
        Specified by:
        getExitActivity in interface MP_Interface
        Returns:
        :: activity list of exit activities for the specific MP model and agent
